title: Bugsplat? how to fix?
body: Is anyone else getting a blugsplat or somekind after trying to load into a rank game? For normal/aram i can get in and play freely. Where as rank, after champ select my screen just goes black, as soon as its about  to go to the loading screen. Should i reinstall league or is there a way to fix?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Apologies for the delayed response.

If you're still experiencing this issue, could you please [run a client repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6) for me. Let me know if this helps.
